detailsData.title: Client-Focused
detailsData.content: We believe in strong customer service. When you work with Flesch And Beck, you get strong support through every stage of your case.

detailsData.title: Trial Tested
detailsData.content: It’s important to find an attorney who actually tries cases in court. At Flesch & Beck Law, our attorneys represent personal injury victims and people accused of criminal acts throughout the Denver area.

detailsData.title: Comprehensive Guide
detailsData.content: Our team has obtained multimillion-dollar verdicts, six-figure settlements in accident cases and many significant defense victories.

detailsData.title: 24/7 Availability
detailsData.content: We offer FREE, no-obligation initial consultations and evening appointments as necessary. We are available to our clients 24/7.

address: 333 W. Hampden Avenue Suite 750 Englewood, CO 80110
valueProp: We work to provide superior representation, with compassion, respect and proactive service. Our Denver lawyers are your advocates throughout the legal process of pursuing a personal injury or wrongful death claim or defending you against criminal charges.

testimonalData.text: I had a legal matter that I needed to resolve quickly and I called several attorneys before meeting Kevin. He put me at ease right away. He did not make guarantees, but he was confident in what would happen. He did exactly what he said he would do and got the matter resolved better than even I expected.
testimonalData.author: Larry

testimonalData.text: I had never needed a lawyer before and was very unsure who to pick. I met with Kevin and he put me at ease and then did exactly what he promised. My case was resolved with fantastic results.
testimonalData.author: Conny

testimonalData.text: I was hurt when I was rear-ended and I used up all my insurance money on treatment for my injuries. I went to Kevin to get fair compensation. His office was very helpful, explained the process and then they followed through like they promised. I got my medical expenses paid and money for future treatment plus I got money for pain and suffering. I was very surprised by the result.
testimonalData.author: Linda
